original_text: In the lips of him that hath understanding wisdom is found: but a rod is for the back of him that is void of understanding.
korean_text: 명철한 자의 입술에는 지혜가 있어도 지혜 없는 자의 등을 위하여는 채찍이 있느니라

sentences.original_text: In the lips of him that hath understanding
but a rod is for the back
of him that is void of understanding
sentences.korean_translation: 지혜가 없는 사람의 등을 위한 것이다
